name: Return_to_Twin_Peaks
text:
Return to Twin Peaks
Return to Twin Peaks is a featurette originally included with the 2007 DVD Twin Peaks: Definitive Gold Box Edition. It features footage from the 2006 Twin Peaks Festival and interviews with various attendees.
The featurette was re-released on the Blu-ray releases Twin Peaks: The Entire Mystery and Twin Peaks: From Z to A.
